7.user: Yeah I feel like i have no motivation
7.system: It's common to feel unmotivated at times, but there are things you can do to help boost your motivation. Have you tried setting specific goals and breaking them down into smaller tasks? This can make it easier to focus on one thing at a time and see progress towards your overall goal. Additionally, finding ways to make the task more interesting or enjoyable can also help increase motivation.
